descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][color=#93c47d]
[font=Georgia]~~~~~Feykro~~~~~[/font][/color]
[/size][size=4]
This mod adds a small but detailed player home. But getting the key isn't going to be that easy. In order to obtain the key you must complete a quest by venturing thru a very dark and dangerous cavern to find the owner. Make sure you're prepared and bring a torch.[/size]

[font=Georgia][color=#93c47d][size=6]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/size][/color][/font][/center]

[youtube]SxT7nIrcTIw[/youtube][youtube]TgT0MSFlMEA[/youtube][youtube]qP8Xvim0PTM[/youtube][youtube]PBXF7ML7-vY[/youtube]

[color=#93c47d][size=4]Features[/size][/color]
- virtually all items are static so no need to worry about knocking them over when you're in a hurry
- all crafting stations except for staff enchanter and Imbuing Chamber
- several custom crafting stations
- tons of storage with several custom storage containers as well
- 1 mannequin, 1 shield display,1 weapon rack with space for 3 weapons, 1 dagger display case
- a bookcase with 2 shelves
- completely navmeshed(house and dungeon)
- cleaned with TES5EDIT
- bed gives well rested bonus
- a quest with a custom built dungeon

[color=#93c47d][size=4]FAQ[/size] [/color]
Q. Where is this house located?
A. [url=http://i.imgur.com/9eYIQMj.jpg]Map[/url]

Q. How do I start the quest?
A. Simply read the note on the door.

Q. What level should I be at when start the quest?
A. Level 10 give or take depending on skill and difficulty settings.

Q. Will the enemies in Cryolite Cavern level to me?
A. Yes, they should level with your character.

Q. Are the containers inside and outside the house safe to store things?
A Yes, they are safe and the inside is set to not respawn. So if you want to fill your house with cabbage you can.

Q. Can I store things in Cryolite Cavern?
A. [color=#e06666]NO, DO NOT STORE THINGS IN CRYOLITE CAVERN IT WILL RESET AND YOUR ITEMS WILL BE LOST. [/color]

Q. If I failed to find the hiding spot and complete the quest can I still find at a later time?
A. Yes, it will still be there if you failed the objective and completed the quest.

Q. I can't find the hiding spot can I get a hint?
A Sure, it's somewhere inside the stone walls.

Q. I still can't find it can you be more specific?
A. [url=http://i.imgur.com/n1bUXxZ.jpg]Spoiler[/url]

Q. What ENB did you use in the screenshots?
A. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15983/?]True Vision ENB[/url]

[color=#93c47d][size=4]Requirements[/size][/color]
- Skyrim up to date
- Dawnguard
- Dragonborn

[color=#93c47d][size=4]Changelog[/size][/color]
V 1.0.2
- added a treasure map container(it's to the left of the safe on the small stack of books)
- a couple small changes

V 1.0.1
- fixed firepit texture

[color=#93c47d][size=4]Known Issues[/size][/color]
[size=3]- [/size]Using a torch inside can cause some minor light flickering
- Due to the large number of static items used it can cause lag on lower end machines
- The quest can be started without reading the note by reaching the end of Cryolite Cavern(Not Recommended)
- The chickens don't like to stay in there pin. Waiting for an hour or two should get them to go back.


[img]http://i.imgur.com/X90AYMu.jpg[/img]
[img width=669,height=376]http://i.imgur.com/t9HTP6l.jpg[/img]

[/url] - Blary [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30605/?]Ingredients in a Jar[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30602/?]Ingredients Wall Art[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30599/?]Alchemy Clutter[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14134/?]Openbooks[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14133/?]Foodcontainer[/url]

[color=#e06666]**PLEASE DO NOT UPLOAD THIS MOD ANYWHERE ELSE**[/color]
